notes:
OPTIONAL BETA UPDATE
beta.2 HOTFIX - fixed issue where meter couldn't detect anything
- completely ported and rewritten the packet sniffer and processor for rust
  - massive performance and memory improvements
- better vpn tracking, allow manual interface selection
- added self-buff summaries (e.g. total damage % during igniter, or total adrenaline uptime)
- added option to turn off transparency for live meter (this was problematic when win11 users needed to turn off blur, but want a darker background)
full patch notes on github
note: this is a beta release, please report bugs to Snow#7777
